name: Easter's Tower- Prologue Demo
description:
Jude Walker is a normal carpenter and woodsman, as well as a member of The Inquisition, a powerful religious force in the 1800's Wild West that bans magic.  While hunting down magic-using heretics, Jude must reconsider his believes, and how they match up with the organization he works for.

~~Controls~~

Move: Arrow Keys / WASD

Attack - Left Click

Interact - E

Dash- Right Click

Climb; Hold Left Shift

~~~~

This is a demo for Easter's Tower, an action adventure game about cowboys escaping from Hell, and reevaluating their spiritual beliefs

This demo was created in 1 and a half months for a school project. Please enjoy!

*NOTE* A couple performance issues have been brought to my attention. These will be fixed as soon as they can be in an updated build. Thank you all for reaching out.
